resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107148</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107148</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202991</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Global Warming: Graphs Tell the Story</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Globales Wärmen: Diagramme erklären die 
Geschichte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chauffage Global : Les graphiques indiquent 
l'histoire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aquecer-se Global: Os gráficos dizem a 
história</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riscaldamento Globale: I grafici dicono alla
storia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παγκόσμια αύξηση της θερμοκρασίας λόγω του φαινομένου
του θερμοκηπίου: Οι γραφικές παραστάσεις λένε την ιστορία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Calentarse Global: Los gráficos cuentan 
la historia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Examine these graphs from the NOVA/ FRONTLINE Web site to see dramatic increases in the temperature of Earth's surface and greenhouse gases in the atmosphere.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Überprüfen Sie diese Diagramme von der 
NOVA-FRONTLINIE Web site, um drastische Zunahmen der Temperatur 
Oberfläche und Gewächshausder gase der Masse in der Atmosphäre zu 
sehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Examinez ces graphiques du site de Web de 
LIGNE DU FRONT de NOVA pour voir des augmentations excessives de la 
température des gaz de la surface et de la serre chaude de la terre 
dans l'atmosphère.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Examine estes gráficos do Web site do NOVA/ 
FRONTLINE para ver aumentos dramáticos na temperatura de gáses da 
superfície e da estufa da terra na atmosfera.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esamini questi grafici dal Web site del NOVA 
FRONTLINE per vedere gli aumenti drammatici nella temperatura dei gas 
della superficie e della serra della terra nell'atmosfera.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξετάστε αυτές τις γραφικές παραστάσεις από τη 
NOVA/ton ιστοχώρο ΠΡΩΤΗΣ ΓΡΑΜΜΉΣ για να δείτε τις 
δραματικές αυξήσεις στη θερμοκρασία της γήινης επιφάνειας και τα 
αέρια θερμοκηπίου στην ατμόσφαιρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Examine estos gráficos del sitio del Web 
de la NOVA FRONTLINE para ver aumentos dramáticos en la temperatura 
de los gases de la superficie y del invernadero de la tierra en la 
atmósfera.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:WGBH EDUCATIONAL FOUNDATION
FN:WGBH EDUCATIONAL FOUNDATION
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202991</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107148</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/global-warming-graphs-tell-the-story</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
